revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Huawei |model=D100 |revision= |asin=B009H44BZA |fcc_date=05/28/2008 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |type=access point, travel router |fcc_id=QISD100 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM5354 |cpu1_cspeed=240 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL032A90TFIR3 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU561622ETP-J |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5354 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=3G capable |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=D100 |default_ssid_regex=^D100$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=Admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:1E:10 |oui_eth=00:1E:10 }} {{TagLine|3G USB WiFi Router - Wi-Fi/LAN Adapter}}
Default settings are per the FCC manual. :The default SSID seems to be '''D100'''. Two user types - admin and user (able to view status only, password is '''user''') :This device uses BCM5354KFBG.
*[http://wiki.openwrt.org/doku.php?id=oldwiki:openwrtdocs:hardware:huawei:d100 ''Huawei D100 3G USB WiFi Router'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :Telnet enabled by default, login credentials admin:admin :(and they do not appear to be [easily] changable)
*[http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/504645 ''Multiple Flaws in Huawei D100'' on '''SecurityFocus'''] *[http://3g-modem.wetpaint.com/page/Huawei+D100,+D100T On '''3g-modem.wetpaint.com''' wiki] *[http://www.pcwintech.com/screenshots-huawei-d100-huawei-firmware Screenshots on '''pcwintech.com''']
